group_1.textLeft: Hyyaaahhh!!![se:4061_landing_jump5]

group_1.textRight: Hah![se:4061_landing_jump5]

group_1.textLeft: Grrraaahhh!

group_1.textRight: Ungh!

group_1.textLeft: I could go all day!

group_1.textRight: Enough!

group_1.textLeft: What?

group_1.textRight: I said enough!

group_1.textLeft: Sorry, but, um...
You've got to be kidding me!
N-no, no, no!@We have to see this through!

group_1.textRight: I've seen enough.
I've seen what you are made of.

group_1.textLeft: What I'm made of...?@[chara:300800:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]Wait a second, what're you—

group_1.textRight: Forgive me for my harsh words earlier.
I had to find out for myself just how@powerful you really are.
And now that I have done so...this battle@is over.

group_1.textLeft: You had to find out… Huh? Why?

group_1.textRight: You were unconscious when I found you.
How could I possibly have known your true@strength at that point?
Now I know for sure.
...That you are worthy of joining me.

group_1.textLeft: Joining?@What's that supposed to mean?

group_1.textRight: Why,[chara:300501:motion_300] I mean we should team up, of course![chara:300501:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]

group_1.textLeft: To fight with you? Not against you?

group_1.textRight: Correct. We'll join forces and fight the@Witches side-by-side.
There is only so much one can do on one's@own, after all.
That's why I hope to form an alliance of@Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: Riiight... I see your point, but...
I'm not exactly looking to team up with@anyone right now.

group_1.textRight: Then let's do this…
Oh no! Akira, help me!
I cannot possibly fight Witches all on@my own!
I am in so, so very much trouble!

group_1.textLeft: What are you doing?@Where's all of this coming from?!

group_1.textRight: I've heard…
That you never abandon people in their@hour of need!

group_1.textLeft: Wha?!
Okay, that's just cheating! Not fair!

group_1.narration: So that, and a bunch of other stuff, @happened...and now we're here...

group_1.textLeft: Here you go. I found your cane.

group_1.textRight: Oh, thank you Akira!

group_1.textLeft: You're welcome.@Take care not to lose it again!

group_1.textRight: Thank you so much! Bye-bye, now!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:800900:effect_fadeout]Byyyeee!
Phew!

group_1.textRight: Great work!

group_1.textLeft: Same to you. Thanks for the help.

group_1.textRight: Oh, don't thank me! @That was total coincidence!

group_1.narration: That's Sasara Minagi. @She's a Magical Girl, too.
I've met a lot of Magical Girls @since I teamed up with Nanaka.
And that circle just keeps getting bigger.
How many Magical Girls are even in@Kamihama, anyway?

group_1.textLeft: Kay, gotta run. Just got a call.

group_1.textRight: Are you off to Nanaka's?

group_1.textLeft: Yep! @She says we need to talk about something.
Something about a real estate agency@[chara:300801:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]in Kamihama. Not really sure.

group_1.textRight: Real estate? Are you starting a business?

group_1.textLeft: No, I don't think--
(Wait... Are we?)
I... I really need to get going. Sorry![chara:300801:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]

group_1.textRight: Okay! See you later!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300401:effect_fadeout]Later![freeze:0.5][chara:300801:effect_fadeout]

group_1.narration: Nanaka always had a unique perspective@from the rest of us. She was always@pondering about who knows what.
But the important thing for now is@that you know how she and I met.
There will be plenty of chances@to tell the rest of the story...

group_1.textCenter: Um...is it just me, or... Does Nanaka @have me wrapped around her finger?
